articles.title: Display and Visibility
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: Block and inline elements. To observe the difference when applying visibility and display property

articles.title: Position Property
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: Position property: 'position' property is used to specify the positioning of an element. There are four basic values to define the positioning method to be adopted by the element they are: 'static', 'relative', 'absolute' and 'fixed'

articles.title: Block & Inline Elements
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: By default HTML elements fall in to two categories for the way they render/lay in a document: i.e, Block & Inline.

articles.title: Float And Clear
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: To arrange block elements linearly that is horizontally one next to other the block  element, float property is made to set to 'left' or 'right'.

articles.title: Vertically align Child Elements
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: By default HTML elements fall in to two categories for the way they render/lay in a document: i.e, Block & Inline.

articles.title: CSS Selectors
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: CSS Selectors enable us to cherry pick each and every element/group of elements to style them.

articles.title: Function Currying
articles.author: Swapnika
articles.description: Function Currying is constructing a function that allows partial application of arguments.
